p: where y is the predicted response; α 0 is a constant coefficient (intercept); α 1, α 2, α 3, and α 4 are linear effects; α 12, α 13, α 14, α 23, α 24, and α 34 are interaction effects; and α 11, α 22, α 33, and α 44 are quadratic effects, whereas χ 1, χ 2, χ 3, and χ 4 are the independent variables NaOH concentration (%), Na 2SO 3 concentration (%), enzyme concentration (%), and autoclaving duration (min).
